data.title: Apps and Sites List
data.description: This page. A list for PianoLab sites and applications.
data.implementation: SSG (Gatsby), Static JSON and GraphQL from gatsby-transformer-json
data.plan: Will be actively maintained in the future

data.title: PianoLab Main Website
data.description: The Lab's main website. Find everything you want to know about the lab here!
data.plan: Migrate to Flatfile CMS (Grav) and SSG (Gatsby)

data.title: Musician Wellness Centre
data.plan: Migrate to Flatfile CMS (Grav) and SSG (Gatsby); Also a possibility to relocate files to other server

data.title: OVL (Online Video Library)
data.description: Online Video Library (for prof.Comeau's course only) and Research Survey management system
data.plan: Split up the research survey system

data.title: Music Reading Test
data.description: A music reading test that shows user the notes to be played, and records their playing as CSV. A usb MIDI keyboard and Chrome browser is required. Can also run as a stand-alone desktop application.
data.plan: Finish the GraphQL implementation; write document

data.title: Surgical Training Video, Suturing and Knot Tying
data.description: For suturing and knot tying motor skill assesment across pianoists and non- pianoists.
data.type: Web Application that plays video and gathers non-sensitive data from anonymous users.
data.plan: Migrate from OVL; Is there a way to automate recording?

data.title: Batch Video Audio Converter and Splitter
